response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Criminal History", "high", "The individual has 3 arrest records and a conviction, which significantly elevates the risk of recidivism."],
    ["Age", "medium", "At 19 years old, the individual is very young, which is associated with a higher likelihood of recidivism, though it is not the most critical factor."],
    ["Employment", "high", "Having held no jobs during the past year indicates low socio-economic stability and is linked to higher recidivism risk."],
    ["Substance Use", "high", "Recent marijuana use over the last four years suggests substance involvement, which is often associated with increased risk."],
    ["Mental Health", "medium", "Experiencing periods of deep sadness may reflect underlying mental health issues that can contribute to recidivism if not addressed."],
    ["Social Support", "medium", "Living alone and never having been married suggests a lack of close personal support, which can moderate the risk."],
    ["Family Environment", "medium", "Growing up in a large household with a biological mother in an urban area carries mixed influences on behavior, adding some risk."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 75
}

risk_factors: The individual has 3 arrest records and a conviction, which significantly elevates the risk of recidivism.
At 19 years old, the individual is very young, which is associated with a higher likelihood of recidivism, though it is not the most critical factor.
Having held no jobs during the past year indicates low socio-economic stability and is linked to higher recidivism risk.
Recent marijuana use over the last four years suggests substance involvement, which is often associated with increased risk.
Experiencing periods of deep sadness may reflect underlying mental health issues that can contribute to recidivism if not addressed.
Living alone and never having been married suggests a lack of close personal support, which can moderate the risk.
Growing up in a large household with a biological mother in an urban area carries mixed influences on behavior, adding some risk.

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 19-year-old male who identifies himself as Black. He has been arrested 3 times and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 0 inches and weighs 168 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held no jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 8, in an urban area.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
